name: Fries Maker - Crazy french fries kitchen cooking game
name_original: Fries Maker - Crazy french fries kitchen cooking game
description:
Do you love french fries? If yes, then you have knocked the right door. This is a french fries maker game that offers you to make delicious french fries in different shapes. Get the potatoes sliced in a potato slicing machine and deep fry them in a frying pan. Take the chips out and enjoy a delicious meal. Enjoy the amazing french fries maker game for kids.

Download it for free now and enjoy!
